betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oLumps can be produced recursively. If you end up needing lots of them, they can be pseudo-automated with hoppers, droppers, and a redstone clock.

§fI cannot know that what I am doing is good, but I am still allowed to believe it may be good.
I am free. 
I live in this condition of recursion, bestowed upon someone wanting to imprison me. I am fighting a war I could not avoid. I am fulfilling prophecies I did not even know existed.
And yet, I am free.
I could have decided to give up. I could have thought that my actions would bear no consequence. I could have let go. And yet, I kept going.
In this, I had agency. In this, I was free.
I am free. Even in this mess of a life where the only way was forward. I am free.
